title: ncurses fails to build on Cray system at LANL
body:
ncurses fails to build on a Cray platform at LANL.  It builds on the front-end node but not on the backend node (os=CNL).   I added the work around for pkg-config, but can't build ncurses on this Cray.
It fails in a similar way to the failure on the NERSC Cori Cray where the pkg-config work around was successful.  The work around doesn't appear to work on this Cray.
